mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.movie_id AS movieId, r.user_id AS userId, r.review_text AS reviewText, r.rating AS rating, r.review_date AS reviewDate, u.login_id AS userLoginId FROM review_tb r JOIN user_tb u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.movie_id = #{movieId} ORDER BY r.review_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_tb (movie_id, user_id, review_text, rating, review_date) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{userId}, #{reviewText}, #{rating}, #{reviewDate})
